replies.body: The fear buff on that skin is a little op...

{{champion:119}} 

If you can't instantly 100-0 him, you're pretty much just another sack of gold.
Fed = can kill anyone instantly. So the scariest is simply the one who has the highest mobility so you cannot escape their wrath...

I'm glad someone found something to irrationally scrutinize and or disagree with my post.  

I was a little worried I might not get one of you in this thread.  

Heavy sigh of relief
Have you ever seen an {{champion:34}} with more than 3 early kills? most unstoppable thing iv'e ever seen.

Anyone who snowballs ludicrously hard. Good luck even thinking about fighting them once they get 2 or 3 kills over you. 

{{champion:84}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:238}}
I'll vote for Akali.  I have NO idea how to escape even an unfed Akali.

{{champion:11}} or{{champion:55}} 
Thats like calling {{champion:75}} or{{champion:13}} scary when fed, good late-game scaling does not mean scary when fed early, not compared to the above anyways.
{{champion:50}}  Just lets his crows kill everyone while healing up :(

LeBlanc,  zed,  fizz.

Basically, free gap closer + escape that can be used to get in and out without a meaningful delay in between.  Doesn't matter if you're doing pretty well in your Lane,  if they're fed and you're not an ahead tank or a super fed other role,  you're going to go 100-0 as soon as you see them (because they can chase you so easily).
Nobody picked {{champion:11}}  ? Master Q is the true Master of cheese.
idk {{champion:79}}  looks pretty fed to me.....
